text.autoconfig.wynnventory.title: Wynnventory Config
text.autoconfig.wynnventory.option.showP: Show price percentage changes (compared to last weeks avg)
text.autoconfig.wynnventory.option.ancho: Anchor tooltips to the sides of the screen
text.autoconfig.wynnventory.option.color: Highlight prices above a certain price
Highlight prices above this price (in emeralds)
text.autoconfig.wynnventory.option.favou: Only display notifications for Mythic items
text.autoconfig.wynnventory.option.showA: Show average price for items (not recommended)
Show average price of the middle 80% (excluding top and bottom 10% outliers)
text.autoconfig.wynnventory.option.showU: Show average price for unidentified items (not recommended)
Show unidentified average price of the middle 80% (excluding top and bottom 10% outliers)
